value:
$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Ahh... Alone at last.$k$pThose kids just don't know when
to stop, blabbering on and on about
their parents... Unbelievable!$k$p"My father this, my father that!"
If that isn't the definition of childish,
I don't know what is!$k$pNot me though. I'm already grown
up if you ask me! Besides, I don't
even know my mother and father!$k$pAnd I'm DEFINITELY not jealous
of those kids! Not one bit!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Hm? Are you...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Wh-who are you?! A dastard from
the shadows? A swindler of some
kind?! Stay away! I'll scream!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|W-wait! Enemies will be upon us
soon. A dire threat approaches.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|What? You can't be serious!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I am. So tell me, do you know of any
Heroes confident in their abilities?
If so, please, bring me to them and—$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Look no further! I'm just the Hero
you're looking for. Leave it to me!$k$pI'll take all ne'er-do-wells to task!
They'll rue the day they messed
with me! Every last one of them!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|E-excuse me?!$k$p

$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Hyah! Rrrah! Ha-chah!
Heee...YAAHHHH!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Incredible. You did it! You're pretty
amazing to have defeated so many
foes yourself, you know that?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Of course I know! I'm just as good
as any other grown-up...if not better!
I can do anything!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I see... Impressive. You must be
strong to be so self-reliant. Much
stronger than I am...$k$pI find myself always chasing the
shadow of my father...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Your...father?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|He gave his life to protect my world.$k$pI want to see him again with all my
heart... That is my singular focus.
I can't give up.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|...*sniff*$k$p*sob*$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Hm? What's the matter?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|I just want to see my parents too...$k$pWh-why did they leave me behind?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Oh, L'Arachel... We share similar
fates, it seems.$k$pI can't return your parents to you,
but...I can stay by your side for now,
if it will bring you comfort.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Oh... Y-yes, please... Just this once.
And...will you stroke my hair?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Ah... Yes, of course.$k$p
